projects.name: Sunn Park (Bachelor Project)
projects.description: Sunn Park is a smart parking solution developed as a bachelor project for Sunnaas Hospital. Built with Next.js, Supabase, and Clerk, the app helps users reserve and manage parking spaces with ease through a responsive and intuitive interface.

projects.name: Big Lemon Restaurant
projects.description: Portfolio project from Meta frontend developer course on Coursera, the project was build using react where the focus was on the use of components

projects.name: Film Database
projects.description: This project is a film database; my main learning objective of this project was to learn how to get data from an external database using the fetch method, handle asynchronous requests, manage state with React hooks, and implement search functionality to enhance user experience.

additionalProjects.name: Coup d'etat in Africa
additionalProjects.description: A school project using journalism and technology to tell stories about thing happening around the world

additionalProjects.name: Europris Online store redesign
additionalProjects.description: This school project involved redesigning Europris's online store based on our market and user research. We identified that customers often complained about the cluttered website and difficulty in finding products. Our final design prioritizes accessibility, decluttering, and creating a simple, intuitive user interface.
